literatureNoteContentTemplate:

citeKey: {{citekey}}
entry: "[Zotero link]({{zoteroSelectURI}})"
year: {{year}}
DOI: {{DOI}}

banner: "<%tp.user.getrandomImage("zob_config/banners")%>"
create: <% tp.date.now("YYYY-MM-DD")%>
update: <% tp.date.now("YYYY-MM-DD")%>
status: 待完成
publish: false
priority: 
aliases: 
  - {{title}}
tags: 
  - paper
---
